Name: Cursed Quest
About the game: ♱ EXPLORE The remains of an alien world concealing as many secrets areas and puzzles as traps and sneaky creatures . ♱ BE TRICKY Using your items cleverly to fight and solve puzzles. Use the landscape elements to hide and one-shot mobs . ♱ BATTLE Challenging bosses to the beat of an electro-dark soundtrack. ♱ SKILLS SANCTUARY Collect experience points by defeating creatures, finding chests and more. Spend them to unlock new abilities (Explosive Arrows, improve your run speed etc.) or buy ammo . ♱ DIE AND RETRY Sacrificing a few ammunition along the way... ♱ REACH THE SOURCE... Features: - Dark / enigmatic atmosphere. - 2 difficulty modes (Normal / Cursed). - 18 skills to unlock / earn. - Challenging bosses. - About 8 hours of play.
